snippet.title: Amazing Maze - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Amazing Maze is a minimalist game in the "roll a ball" genre where you have to capture the crystals and find the way out in beautiful 3D mazes. Use your creativity and logical thinking to overcome obstacles or use them to your advantage. Be quick and put your name on the top of the leaderboards!

Available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2107580/Amazing_Maze/
